verses.verse: Lord <WH3068>, you have been favorable <WH7521> unto your land <WH776>: you have brought back <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of Jacob <WH3290>.
You have forgiven <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of your people <WH5971>, you have covered <WH3680> all their sin <WH2403>. Selah <WH5542>.
You have taken away <WH622> all your wrath <WH5678>: you have turned <WH7725> yourself from the fierceness <WH2740> of your anger <WH639>.
Turn <WH7725> us <WH430>, O God of our salvation <WH3468>, and cause your anger <WH3708> toward us to cease <WH6565>.
Will you be angry <WH599> with us for ever <WH5769>? will you draw out <WH4900> your anger <WH639> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>?
Will you not revive <WH2421> us again <WH7725>: that your people <WH5971> may rejoice in you <WH8055>?
Show <WH7200> us your mercy <WH2617>, O Lord <WH3068>, and grant <WH5414> us your salvation <WH3468>.

I will hear <WH8085> what God <WH410> the Lord <WH3068> will speak <WH1696>: for he will speak <WH1696> peace <WH7965> unto his people <WH5971>, and to his saints <WH2623>: but let them not turn again <WH7725> to wickedness <WH3690>.
Surely his salvation <WH3468> is near <WH7138> them that fear <WH3373> him <WH3519>; that glory may live <WH7931> in our land <WH776>.
Mercy <WH2617> and truth <WH571> are met together <WH6298>; righteousness <WH6664> and peace <WH7965> have kissed each other <WH5401>.
Truth <WH571> shall spring out <WH6779> of the earth <WH776>; and righteousness <WH6664> shall look down <WH8259> from heaven <WH8064>.
Yes <WH3068>, the Lord shall give <WH5414> that which is good <WH2896>; and our land <WH776> shall yield <WH5414> her increase <WH2981>.
Righteousness <WH6664> shall go <WH1980> before <WH6440> him <WH7760>; and shall set us in the way <WH1870> of his steps <WH6471>.
